name: Tangerine
description:
Tangerine is the story of a couple of traveling mercenaries and their quest to save a small, peaceful village from the Goblin King.

This is my first RPGmaker game and I kind of didn't know what I was doing when I made this.  I tried to compensate for my lack of experience by going all in on the visuals. 

It can be a bit difficult because it's technically unfinished and missing a planned party member, but I think it's still a fun little game.

I plan on remaking it sometime in the near future...
